summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Building and Construction Code, amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 22.602.010 B; 22.602.020; 22.602.030; 22.602.040; and 22.602.080 to prescribe fees for Fire Department examinations, change the fee on certain permits and adding a new fee and adding a new Section 22.600.050 to provide for the duration of a certificate of examination.
